productName: SanDisk Sansa m240 - Digital player - flash 1 GB - WMA, MP3 - silver
title: Awesome product, great features, and a good buy.
author: C. Burnside "Jabba Jaw"
fullText: day decided breakdown purchase mp3 player choice look ipods offer liked ipod shuffle size lacking sansa m240 memory display fm tuner voice recorder main features caught attention nice sansa m240 takes aaa battery lasts hours doesnt itunes format ton mp3s pc dont spend time converting plug usb port drag tracks simple player lightweight im glad sold 1gb ipod shuffles im fan apple products apple system computer world simple convert else standard
